nodes.text: Tallus was an individual who served the Galactic Empire as a lieutenant in the Imperial Military. Around 14 BBY, the officer was stationed at the forested planet of Kashyyyk. During a military lineup there, Tallus scolded a member of the Stormtrooper Corps for having slyyyg slime on his boots. The trooper and a fellow soldier later grumbled about the slime and Tallus' remarks, and they were overheard by Cal Kestis, a former Jedi Padawan who was fighting the Imperial occupation.
Tallus was first mentioned in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. In the game, Tallus can be mentioned by non-playable stormtroopers and scout troopers on Kashyyyk.
